snippet.title: Metavoidal Steam Trailer 2023 - Remixed Update
snippet.description:
New Gameplay Footage & Steam Trailer for roguelite pixel art game, Metavoidal!

Use your skills as a drummer to fight your way out of the clutches of a metal band. Tap into the power of the music, and use it to strengthen your abilities. Metavoidal is a Roguelite Brawler where you fight to escape the corruption of metal music in your home town.

📀 Unlock new perks to take into your next run
🥁 Beat the crowd back with a new ranged attack, the drumstick flick
🎧 Collect tracks & create your own metal fighting playlist

Die, buy & retry in Metavoidal’s Remixed Update. Live on our Itch.io page:
https://yellowlabgames.itch.io/metavoidal

Wishlist the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2221780/Metavoidal/

Or

Follow us on Twitter
https://twitter.com/YellowLabGames


See you at the next update!
